properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 5:51AM PST until February 7 at 5:45PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a

* Flood Warning for Urban Areas and Small Streams in...
Northwestern Umatilla County in northeastern Oregon...

* Until 545 PM PST Friday.

* At 541 AM PST, law enforcement reported that partial evacuations
were occurring in Echo and Stanfield due to flooding from the
Umatilla River...and Interstate 84 is closed due to high water
from mileposts 182 to 193 with trucks stuck in the water. This is
a dangerous situation!

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Hermiston, Stanfield, Echo, Umatilla.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Excessive runoff will cause flooding of small creeks and streams,
urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage areas and low lying spots.

Excessive runoff will cause flooding of small creeks and streams,
country roads, farmland, and other low lying spots.
